introduction: SYNOPSISSun-mi, who is barely a star, Hye-ri, a top actress, and Ji-yeon, a TV actress - they star in erotic films at the advice of Mrs. Min and become stars. Sun-mi only meets with important men of high society and she in turn receives their love. However, Sun-mi feels grief and sadness. At this time, she meets Dong-wuk and she finds happiness and solace. Engaged to be married, Sun-mi goes to greet Dong-wuk's father when she realizes that he is one of the important men she's slept with. She falls into shock. Sun-mi fervently wishes to find her true self and get on with her life but Mrs. Min has an elaborate, systematic plan to bring about a tragic end for Sun-mi.故事女主角惠利，船尾和顶级明星成为明星的天赋延迟是一个演员来处理黄色书刊的闵女士变更为明星。斯特恩接受chongaeeul他们对巨人，只有上层阶级感到酸楚。在这里，我们满足DongWook得到的快乐和生活的安慰。DongWook的父亲提前知道谁已经辞职了他们与hwipssainda影响关系的名人人员之间的婚姻。他们的真实面貌的愿望的梦，然后去生活的方式，但今天，敏姬紧的悲惨结束后和前组织的阴谋。
